name: A night at the office (Sam Coleman)
name_original: A night at the office (Sam Coleman)
description:
👻🎃A night at the office🎃👻

The skeletons of halloween aren't seeing the numbers they used to from jump scares and traditional spooking.

So they look for a new method to spook humans to their core.

Walk round this office block and meet the skeleton workers, and hear their spooky words.

Controls:

WASD: To Move

Left Click: To Turn on torch

For the best performance please download the Desktop Version! Follow my twitter for more games in the future

 https://twitter.com/samc0leman
